name: Solar System (itch) (Bluestone33105)
description:
Didn't get a Mac version because Unity didn't give me the option (third screenshot) Don't know how that happened, help? 

Besides that, I'm done.

I removed the comets, added all the planets (exept Pluto, which, not being a planet, is not included in most models), and I used Blender to give Saturn a ring, but I didn't do much besides that. Messed with the scale some.

It says I need to give credits.

I'm "Lucas O'Connor." 

Its just me.

Well, Congratulations. You are probably done with this module around now, so farewell, have a wonderful time.

And be careful, its loud : )

(No, seriously, it sounds almost as bad as my computer.)
